sys_ux_client_script.name: Set Related Item Content

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_fcdd944c1bb819106a08a9b4bd4bcbf4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">60dd944c1bb819106a08a9b4bd4bcbbf</macroponent><name>Set Related Item Content</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var resultTabContent = {
  ...api.state.relatedTabContent,
  ...event.payload.relatedTabContent,
};
    api.setState('relatedTabContent', resultTabContent);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-15 00:51:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>fcdd944c1bb819106a08a9b4bd4bcbf4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Related Item Content</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fcdd944c1bb819106a08a9b4bd4bcbf4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-15 01:03:55</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
